languages.text: "Прежде чем приступить к обряду... Я хотела вновь посмотреть в глаза {mf|мужчине|женщине}, чья {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}слава{/d} столь велика, что сумела пробраться за неприступные стены Эурак-V задолго до нашей встречи. Это и правда вы, {name}. Человек, о котором говорит весь Простор и сектор Каликсис. А теперь... еще и Вольный Торговец".

"Before I begin the ritual... I wish to look once again into the eyes of the {mf|man|woman} whose {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}fame{/d} is so great it managed to penetrate the impregnable walls of Eurac V long before we ever met. It truly is you, {name}. The person the whole Expanse and Calixis Sector are talking about. And now... a Rogue Trader as well."
languages.original_text: "Прежде чем приступить к обряду... Я хотела вновь посмотреть в глаза {mf|мужчине|женщине}, чья {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}слава{/d} столь велика, что сумела пробраться за неприступные стены Эурак-V задолго до нашей встречи. Это и правда вы, {name}. Человек, о котором говорит весь Простор и сектор Каликсис. А теперь... еще и Вольный Торговец".

The person the whole Expanse and Calixis Sector are talking about. And now... a Rogue Trader as well."

It truly is you, {name}. The person the whole Expanse and Calixis Sector are talking about. And now... a Rogue Trader as well."

It truly is you, {name}. The person the whole Expanse and Calixis Sector are talking about. And now... a Rogue Trader as well."

"Before I begin the ritual... I wish to look once again into the eyes of the {mf|man|woman} whose fame is so great it managed to penetrate the impregnable walls of Eurac V long before we ever met. It truly is you, {name}. The person the whole Expanse and Calixis Sector are talking about. And now... a Rogue Trader as well."

languages.text: “在举行仪式之前……我想再亲眼看看你的双眼。你的{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}名声{/d}是如此煊赫，甚至越过了欧拉克五号星坚不可摧的高墙。早在我们相遇之前，我就已经听说过你了。真的是你，{name}，整个科罗努斯扩区与卡利西斯星区都在谈论的焦点。而现在……你成为了行商浪人。”
languages.original_text: "Before I begin the ritual... I wish to look once again into the eyes of the {mf|man|woman} whose {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}fame{/d} is so great it managed to penetrate the impregnable walls of Eurac V long before we ever met. It truly is you, {name}. The person the whole Expanse and Calixis Sector are talking about. And now... a Rogue Trader as well."

traits.locale_text: “在举行仪式之前……我想再亲眼看看你的双眼。你的名声是如此煊赫，甚至越过了欧拉克五号星坚不可摧的高墙。早在我们相遇之前，我就已经听说过你了。真的是你，{name}，整个科罗努斯扩区与卡利西斯星区都在谈论的焦点。而现在……你成为了行商浪人。”

languages.text: «Antes de empezar el ritual... quiero mirar a los ojos a{mf|l hombre| la mujer} cuya {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}fama{/d} ha logrado atravesar los inexpugnables muros de Eurac V mucho antes de que nos conociéramos. En verdad es {name}. La persona de la que toda la Extensión y el sector Calixis han oído hablar. Y ahora... por si fuera poco también es Comerciante Independiente».
languages.original_text: "Before I begin the ritual... I wish to look once again into the eyes of the {mf|man|woman} whose {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}fame{/d} is so great it managed to penetrate the impregnable walls of Eurac V long before we ever met. It truly is you, {name}. The person the whole Expanse and Calixis Sector are talking about. And now... a Rogue Trader as well."

traits.locale_text: «Antes de empezar el ritual... quiero mirar a los ojos a{mf|l hombre| la mujer} cuya fama ha logrado atravesar los inexpugnables muros de Eurac V mucho antes de que nos conociéramos. En verdad es {name}. La persona de la que toda la Extensión y el sector Calixis han oído hablar. Y ahora... por si fuera poco también es Comerciante Independiente».

languages.text: 「儀式を始める前に…あたくしは今一度、出会う前からその{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}名声{/d}がユーラック・Vの堅固な壁をも貫くほどに大きなものだった人物の目を見たいのです。そう、それは陛下です、{name}様。エクスパンスとキャリクシス星域の誰もが噂する人物。そして…今や自由開拓者ともなったそのお方」
languages.original_text: "Before I begin the ritual... I wish to look once again into the eyes of the {mf|man|woman} whose {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}fame{/d} is so great it managed to penetrate the impregnable walls of Eurac V long before we ever met. It truly is you, {name}. The person the whole Expanse and Calixis Sector are talking about. And now... a Rogue Trader as well."

traits.locale_text: 「儀式を始める前に…私は今一度、出会う前からその名声がユーラック・Vの堅固な壁をも貫くほどに大きなものだった人物の目を見たいです。そう、それはあなたです、{name}。エクスパンスとキャリクシス星域の誰もが噂する人物。そして…今や自由開拓者ともなったその人」
「儀式を始める前に…あたくしは今一度、出会う前からその{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}名声{/d}がユーラック・Vの堅固な壁をも貫くほどに大きなものだった人物の目を見たいのです。そう、それは陛下です、{name}様。エクスパンスとキャリクシス星域の誰もが噂する人物。そして…今や自由開拓者ともなったそのお方」

languages.text: « Avant de commencer le rituel... j'aimerais de nouveau plonger mon regard dans les yeux de {mf|celui|celle} dont la {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}réputation{/d} a traversé jusqu'aux murs impénétrables d'Eurac-V bien avant notre rencontre. C'est donc vraiment vous, {name}. {mf|Celui|Celle} dont tout le monde parle dans les Étendues et dans le secteur Calixis. Sans compter que vous êtes désormais {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}... »
languages.original_text: "Before I begin the ritual... I wish to look once again into the eyes of the {mf|man|woman} whose {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}fame{/d} is so great it managed to penetrate the impregnable walls of Eurac V long before we ever met. It truly is you, {name}. The person the whole Expanse and Calixis Sector are talking about. And now... a Rogue Trader as well."

traits.locale_text: « Avant de commencer le rituel... j'aimerais de nouveau plonger mon regard dans les yeux de {mf|celui|celle} dont la réputation a traversé jusqu'aux murs impénétrables d'Eurac-V bien avant notre rencontre. C'est donc vraiment vous, {name}. {mf|Celui|Celle} dont tout le monde parle dans les Étendues et dans le secteur Calixis. Sans compter que vous êtes désormais {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}... »

languages.text: "Bevor ich mit dem Ritual beginne ... möchte ich noch einmal {mf|dem Mann in die Augen blicken, dessen|der Frau in die Augen blicken, deren} {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}Ruhm{/d} so groß ist, dass er die uneinnehmbaren Wände von Eurac V durchdrungen hat, ehe wir uns je begegnet waren. Ihr seid es wirklich, {name}. Die Person, von der die gesamte Ausdehnung und der gesamte Calixis-Sektor sprechen. Und nun ... auch noch {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}."
languages.original_text: "Before I begin the ritual... I wish to look once again into the eyes of the {mf|man|woman} whose {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}fame{/d} is so great it managed to penetrate the impregnable walls of Eurac V long before we ever met. It truly is you, {name}. The person the whole Expanse and Calixis Sector are talking about. And now... a Rogue Trader as well."

traits.locale_text: "Bevor ich mit dem Ritual beginne ... möchte ich noch einmal {mf|dem Mann in die Augen blicken, dessen|der Frau in die Augen blicken, deren} Ruhm so groß ist, dass er die uneinnehmbaren Wände von Eurac V durchdrungen hat, ehe wir uns je begegnet waren. Ihr seid es wirklich, {name}. Die Person, von der die gesamte Ausdehnung und der gesamte Calixis-Sektor sprechen. Und nun ... auch noch {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}."

languages.text: "Ayine başlamadan evvel... {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}Namı{/d} biz tanışmadan çok öncesinde Eurac V'in zapt edilemez duvarlarını aşmayı başarmış {mf|adamın|kadının} gözlerine bir kez daha bakmak istedim. Sahiden de sensin {name}. Tüm Enginlik ve Calixis Sektörü'nün dilinden düşürmediği o kişi karşımda. Üstelik kendisi artık... Hür Tacir."
languages.original_text: "Before I begin the ritual... I wish to look once again into the eyes of the {mf|man|woman} whose {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}fame{/d} is so great it managed to penetrate the impregnable walls of Eurac V long before we ever met. It truly is you, {name}. The person the whole Expanse and Calixis Sector are talking about. And now... a Rogue Trader as well."

traits.locale_text: "Ayine başlamadan evvel... Namı biz tanışmadan çok öncesinde Eurac V'in zapt edilemez duvarlarını aşmayı başarmış {mf|adam|kadın}ın gözlerine bir kez daha bakmak istedim. Sahiden de sensin {name}. Tüm Enginlik ve Calixis Sektörü'nün dilinden düşürmediği o kişi karşımda. Üstelik kendisi artık... Hür Tüccar."
